summary: A unit‑test module that validates the cupyx.scipy.special implementation of the polygamma function by comparing its output to reference results for scalars, ranges, linearly spaced arrays, and special values such as infinities and NaNs, while also checking warning behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and numerical stability of the polygamma routine in the GPU‑accelerated scientific library, ensuring compatibility with established SciPy behavior and preventing regressions in future releases.
